messages.content:
summarize this: The scaled-up project of the potting mix will include the following activities: 
Procurement of the manure composting system materials and the required machines (big shredder, a double shaft mixer, packaging machine)
Buying manures from the coordinated cattle and poultry surrounding farms with an amount of 60 tons per 2 months
 Constructing manure composting system comprising of 2 piles and leachate drainage system on the current facility site. 
Shredding all the brown organic materials to speed up the production cycle. 
Add the whole materials mixture together and uniform its structure by the shaft mixer 
Storage of the final product in a sealed area to improve its stability.

Identify the beneficiaries and interested users of the product.
Awareness sessions for farmers in the region.
Get into contact and collaborate with municipalities, agriculture associations, firms, cooperatives, NGOs, clubs, farmers, traders, importers. 
Develop market analysis and let Compost baladi as they are the implementing party of composting to handle part of marketing and sales of the end products.
Promote the product after confirming the compliance of its quality with the international standards on social media pages, tv channels and reportages.
While for the proposed solution of fish fertilizers it is considered a new solution and is planned to be implemented in purchasing the most recommended machines as a full system  to complete the role of the soil amendments, replace the usage of synthetic fertilizers in many plants and avoid the non-mature products utilization.

The scaled-up project of the potting mix involves various activities such as procuring materials and machines for the manure composting system, purchasing manures from surrounding farms, constructing a composting system on-site, shredding organic materials, mixing the materials together, storing the final product, and promoting it after ensuring its compliance with international standards. 

The beneficiaries and interested users of the product include farmers in the region who can use the potting mix for their crops. Awareness sessions will be conducted for farmers to educate them about the benefits of the product. The project also aims to collaborate with municipalities, agriculture associations, firms, cooperatives, NGOs, clubs, farmers, traders, and importers. Compost baladi, as the implementing party, will handle part of the marketing and sales of the end products. 

Additionally, the proposed solution of fish fertilizers is considered a new approach. It involves purchasing recommended machines to implement a full system for soil amendments. The aim is to replace the use of synthetic fertilizers in many plants and avoid the utilization of non-mature products.

summarize this: As a growing business, we understand the importance of having access to proper mentorship and training. We are eager to learn from industry experts who can guide us in scaling our operations in a way that is both efficient and effective. With the support of this grant, we hope to access mentorship and training programs that will help us achieve our growth objectives.

Furthermore, we recognize that our team is the backbone of our organization. We want to ensure that we are hiring and developing top talent to continue to drive our success. We believe that with your support and knowledge, we can grow our team in a way that benefits our company.

Lastly, we are grateful for any financial support that can help us achieve our goals. As a small business, every little bit counts, and we are confident that this grant will have a big impact on our growth trajectory.

As a growing business, we value the importance of mentorship and training to enhance our operations effectively and efficiently. We aim to learn from industry experts who can guide us in scaling our business. By obtaining this grant, we hope to access mentorship and training programs that align with our growth objectives.

Additionally, we understand that our team plays a crucial role in our organization's success. To ensure continuous growth, we aim to recruit and develop top talent. We believe that with your support and expertise, we can expand our team in a way that benefits our company.

Finally, we appreciate any financial support that can contribute to our goals. As a small business, even small amounts can make a significant difference, and we are confident that this grant will have a positive impact on our growth trajectory.

summarize this in English: مشكلة النفايات التي بلغت ذروتها في لبنان في الاونة الاخيرة في اظل الوضع الاقتصادي والتفلت الامني وعدم اهتمام الدولة بالمتابعة او بحل هذه المشكلة ، وانا كبيولوجية اعلم مدى تاثير النفايات والتلوث على المناخ وعلى الحياة في البر والبخر قررت القيام بهذه المبادة والتاثيؤ قدر الامكان ، لا احد.سينقذنا من الغرق في النفايات ان لم ننقذ انفسنا

The waste problem in Lebanon has reached its peak in recent years due to the economic situation, security issues, and the lack of government attention or solutions. As a biologist, I am aware of the impact of waste and pollution on the climate and life on land and in water. Therefore, I have decided to take this initiative and make a difference as much as possible. No one will save us from drowning in waste if we don't save ourselves.

summarize this in English:
الحل هو التقليل من استعمال المواد الغير صديقة للبيئة ،والفرز من المصدر الذي نعمل علىية بحيث نخفف من نسبة النفايات وخاصة الغير قابلة للتحلل مع الزمن ونمنع وصولها الى المطامر او الى الاماكن الطبيعية ومن ثم اعادة التدوير

The solution is to reduce the use of environmentally unfriendly materials and implement source separation, which helps to decrease the amount of waste generated, especially non-biodegradable waste. This approach aims to prevent such waste from reaching landfills or natural areas and promotes recycling.

translate to English اريد توسيع رقعة المشروع ومضاعفة الإنتاج ينقصني الطاقة الشمسية البديلة بسبب انقطاع الكهرباء المتكرر والكهرباء عامل رئيسي في مشروعي ينقصني الواح الطاقة الشمسية والبطاريات والانفرتر وينقصني بيت بلاستيكي اخر

I want to expand the project's scope and double the production. I lack alternative solar energy due to frequent power outages, and electricity is a key factor in my project. I am in need of solar panels, batteries, inverters, and another plastic house.

summarize in English تعاني المنطقة من الافتقار للانتاج الزراعي والمحاصيل الزراعية بسبب طبيعة البلاد الجبلية وعدم توفر المياه باغلب المناطق ومشروعي عم يحل مشكلة كبيرة بالمنطقة وهي افتقار للمنتج الصحي منتجي عم يكون محلي الصنع عم يكون إنتاجنا محلي واكتفاءنا ذاتي منتج صحي مشبع بالفيتامينات والبروتينات والمعادن النافعة خالي من الهرمونات والمواد الكيميائية منتج صحي نظيف

The region suffers from a lack of agricultural production and crops due to the mountainous nature of the country and the scarcity of water in most areas. My project is addressing a significant problem in the region, which is the lack of a healthy local product. Our production is local, and we aim for self-sufficiency in providing a healthy product that is rich in vitamins, proteins, and beneficial minerals. Our product is free from hormones and chemical substances, making it a clean and healthy option.

summarize in English تعاني المنطقة من الافتقار للانتاج الزراعي والمحاصيل الزراعية بسبب طبيعة البلاد الجبلية وعدم توفر المياه باغلب المناطق ومشروعي عم يحل مشكلة كبيرة بالمنطقة وهي افتقار للمنتج الصحي منتجي عم يكون محلي الصنع عم يكون إنتاجنا محلي واكتفاءنا ذاتي منتج صحي مشبع بالفيتامينات والبروتينات والمعادن النافعة خالي من الهرمونات والمواد الكيميائية منتج صحي نظيف

The region suffers from a lack of agricultural production and crops due to the mountainous nature of the country and the scarcity of water in most areas. My project is addressing a significant problem in the region, which is the lack of a healthy product. Our locally-made product aims to solve this issue by providing a self-sufficient and healthy option that is rich in vitamins, proteins, and beneficial minerals. It is free from hormones and chemical substances, making it a clean and healthy choice.
لايوجد ميزانية محددة اوسقف محدد لهذا المشروع كل مازدنا الكمية زادت الأرباح وأرباح هذا المشروع مضاعفة  in englihs
There is no specific budget or limit for this project. As we increase the quantity, the profits also increase. The profits of this project are multiplied.

عم نقدم منتج جديد للمنطقة واقتصادي وأقل تكلفة من منتج الزراعة العادية بالتربة وعم وفر جهد ووقت عالمستهلك والمزارع عم خفف من موارد الطاقة والمحروقات منتجي الاورجانو الطبيعي عم يكون من إنتاجنا محلي  in enligh

We are introducing a new product to the region that is economical and has lower costs compared to traditional soil-based agriculture. It saves effort, time, and resources for consumers and farmers. Our organic product is locally produced, reducing energy consumption and fuel usage.

summarize in English: تربية الدواجن بالأعشاب والطب البديل
تتلخص فكرة المشروع في تربية الدواجن اللاحمة علي الأعشاب الطبيعية من خلال إضافتها  الي الأعلاف المقدمة للدواجن  دون اللجوء لأي حقن كيماوية الذي توثر علي صحة المستهلكين بالعديد من الأمراض القلبية وأمراض الكلي والكبد  وهذه الأعشاب لها أهمية كبيرة للدواجن منها ترفع المناعة وتزود البكتيريا النافعة وتطهر الأمعاء وتعزز عملية الهضم وتعالج الكوكسيديا وبعض الأعشاب تحتوي علي البوتاسيوم والفسفور وفاتحة للشهية والعديد من الفوائد التي لا حصر لها وأهم ما سيميز هذه الدواجن هو فرق المذاق حيث أنني سأقدم منتجات صحية وصديقة للأسرة وللبيئة ويعتمد مشروعي علي مبدأ الوقاية خير من العلاج فهذه الأعشاب تعطي للدواجن لإكسابهم مناعة جيدة لمقاومة الأمراض مما يجعلني غير محتاجة لأي ادوية كيماوية او بيولوجية

The idea of the project is summarized in raising poultry on natural herbs without resorting to any chemical injections. This method avoids the negative effects of chemical injections on the health of consumers, which can lead to various diseases such as heart, kidney, and liver diseases. These herbs have great importance for poultry, as they boost immunity, provide beneficial bacteria, cleanse the intestines, enhance digestion, treat coccidiosis, and contain potassium and phosphorus. They also act as appetite stimulants and have numerous other benefits. What sets these poultry apart is the distinctive taste. I will offer healthy and family-friendly products that are environmentally friendly. My project is based on the principle of prevention being better than cure, as these herbs give the poultry good immunity to fight diseases, eliminating the need for any chemical or biological medications.

summarize in English: منطقة عرسال اللبنانية التي تضم أكبر عدد من النازحين بنسبة 70الف ويبلغ عدد سكانها الأصل 45 الف حيث يصبح العدد الكلي 115 الف حسب إحصائيات بلدية عرسال بعد جائحة كورونا والحجر الصحي وفرض وزير التعليم قرار بتسكير المدارس ونقل التعليم عبر الانترنت من هنا ظهر ضعف المهارات والخبرة التقنية لدى الطلاب والأهلي مما أدى الى تسريب الطلاب في تلك الفترة وذلك أدى إلى وجود طلاب من جميع المراحل لا يملكون خبرات ومهارات في التقنيات وأيضا عدم القدرة على اكتساب مهارات مهنية وتعليمية كما قالت أحدى شهود العيان (ن.م) خلال دراستنا للخريطة المجتمعية بعد ما صار التعليم عبر الانترنت واجهة كتير صعوبة بتعليم أطفالي وهل شي خلاني وقف تدريسهم عبر الإنترنت ليرجعو يفتحو المدارس وكان من أكبر سلبيات جائحة كورونا تفشي الفقر و تدهور الوضع الاقتصادي لعدم قدرة الأشخاص المعيلة على ممارسة أعمالهم

The Lebanese town of Arsal hosts the largest number of displaced people, with around 70,000 displaced individuals out of its original population of 45,000, resulting in a total population of 115,000 according to the municipality's statistics. After the outbreak of the COVID-19 pandemic and the subsequent lockdown measures, the Minister of Education decided to close schools and shift to online education. However, this revealed a lack of technological skills and experience among students and their families, leading to a high dropout rate during that period. Consequently, students of all ages lacked proficiency in technology and struggled to acquire vocational and educational skills. According to one eyewitness (N.M), teaching my children through online platforms became very challenging, which prompted me to stop their online education and wait for the reopening of schools. One of the major negative impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic was the exacerbation of poverty and the deterioration of the economic situation, as breadwinners were unable to carry out their work effectively.

translate فنحن مجموعة شابات وشباب لدينا الخبرات الكافية لإدارة مشروع يسعى لدعم الطلاب تعليما وتقنيا وتنمية مهاراتهم قمنا بتشكيل فريق بعد انتهاء جائحة كورونا يسعى لإعادة تأهيل الطلاب من خلال تدريبات قمنا عليها

We are a group of young men and women who possess sufficient experience to manage a project aimed at supporting students academically, technically, and in the development of their skills. After the end of the COVID-19 pandemic, we formed a team that seeks to rehabilitate students through the training exercises we have conducted.

translate: اولويتنا ادخال تدريبات الفنون جديدة الى المنطقة (مسرح وموسيقا) نطمح لتدريب فريق مسرحي واخر موسيقي وانشاء عروض تسلط الضوء على مشكلات مجتمع  وايضا تدريباتنا التى تضم تدريبات كمبيوتر وتصوير ومونتاج وزيادة خبرة الشباب والشابات في المنطقة وتوفير الوقت والجهد بسبب صعوبة الحصول على هذه التدريبات ضمن عرسال  وايضا مهتمين بجانب التوعوية ويضم نشاطات اطفال ترفيهية وتعليمية وجلسات توعية حول الجندر والادوار الجندرية والعنف القائم 
 على النوع الاجتماعي

Our priority is to introduce new arts training to the region, specifically in theater and music. We aspire to train a theater team as well as a music team and create performances that shed light on societal issues. Additionally, our training program includes computer skills, photography, and video editing, aiming to enhance the experience of young men and women in the area. We aim to save time and effort by providing these training opportunities locally, as they are difficult to access in Arsal. We are also interested in raising awareness through activities for children, including entertainment and educational sessions, as well as conducting awareness sessions on gender, gender roles, and gender-based violence.
